page.title: 19FAVOURITE T.V. PROGRAMMES
page.content: Twenty children (aged 8-9) were asked about their favourite T.V. programme with these results: Dogtanian & the 3 Muskahounds.......6 (Cartoon) Hunter..............................5 (American "cop" series) Sons and Daughters..................1 (Australian soap opera) He Man..............................2 (Science Fiction) Grange Hill.........................2 (Story about a Comprehensive School) Street Hawk.........................3 (Science Fiction) Cosby Show..........................1 (American Comedy) Auto Man............................1 (Science Fiction) Dallas..............................1 (American soap opera)
